Purpose

The gola of healthyR.ai is to provide a consistent verb framework for performing data modeling and forecasting for problems like classification and regression on both administrative and clinical hospital data.

`healthyR.ai` can be found [here](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai)
